name: AN_STAFF
description: This table contains information about the providers who have been documented as being responsible on an anesthesia record, including their role and begin and end times.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AN_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who is responsible for the anesthesia record.

columns.name: AN_PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia staff type category number for the provider's responsible role.

columns.name: AN_BEGIN_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The local date and time when the provider began responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_BEGIN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the provider began responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_END_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The local date and time when the provider ended responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the provider ended responsibility for the record.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who documented the responsible staff information.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the entry was modified.

columns.name: AN_EDIT_LN
columns.description: The line number from the anesthesia staff audit trail table that contains the previous information on this staff member's responsibility.

columns.name: AN_BEGIN_PAT_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the start time of the staff member. The time is in the patient department's time zone.

columns.name: AN_END_PAT_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the end time of the staff member. The time is in the patient department's time zone.
